replies.body:
{{champion:53}} **Well Jarvan IV finally appear again. Wonder where he went? Oh well it doesn't matter to me. What matters is getting his next date going. Today is Leona. And to make sure it doesn't end like his date with Lux, I have told her in advance about not blinding him and to be aware of that dragon lady. **


{{champion:89}} Thanks for taking me here to eat tonight. 

{{champion:59}} It's no problem. I am actually curious about this place as I have never been here before. 

{{champion:89}} Oh it great. And the cook is amazing. In fact her he comes now. 

{{champion:80}} Welcome to Targon, the restaurant with food from Mount Targon itself.  

{{champion:89}} I will have my usual. 

{{champion:80}} Very well and for the Gentleman I recommend our steak. 

{{champion:59}} That sounds good. Haven't had one in a long time. 

{{champion:80}} Excellent. And for dessert I recommend our 'If you do anything to make her cry I will break your back, throw you down a well, and skywall in after you' soufflé. 

{{champion:59}} *gulp* Ok sir. 

{{champion:80}} Excellent. I will be back later with your food.

{{champion:89}} *giggle* It ok if this is a one time date. I usually just make guys bring me here for the food. I love it but it is expensive for me. 

{{champion:59}} Oh thank god. 

{{champion:89}} Yeah let us just enjoy this night without anyone trying to kill us. Speaking of which, I don't see that dragon lady I was warned about. 

{{champion:59}} She at the doctor today. She wasn't feeling well this morning. 

{{champion:89}} Oh my I hope it not serious. 

{{champion:59}}  Nah she probably just caught a cold from the weather changing so much lately. 

{{champion:80}} A drink for you Leona, compliments from that person at the bar. 

{{champion:131}} *waves seductively*

{{champion:89}} Oh dear god. Can't you do anything about her please?

{{champion:80}} Can't. She owns this place. 

{{champion:59}} Umm..am I missing something?

{{champion:89}} We were...drunk during News Years..stuff happen. 

{{champion:59}} Oh....OH.

{{champion:89}} Let's change the subject. Unless you want to talk about what happen to you on New Years. 

{{champion:59}} Nope. 


*At the Doctor*

{{champion:102}} So is everything alright. 

{{champion:85}} I am not sure. I think you should check this X-ray for yourself. 

{{champion:102}} Is that....Oh no...

Royal dragon babies? Oh my. 
And keep up the good work lightdragoon88.
Wait... did Jarven just have a .... normal date? O.o
As normal as it can be while having {{champion:80}} staring spears in your back.
And {{champion:131}} trying to put the moves on your date...
Leona x Diana lol
If anyone has spears in their back, it's Kalista.

Who knows? 

...Oh wait...I do. :P
tell me DX
I doubt it. You don't x-ray a woman without first giving her a pregnancy test. X-rays kill babies. GGWP :(

Well, Shyvana lays eggs, so technically eggs should be safe from X-rays.  Well, SHOULD be.  I sure hope so.  Anyway, great job lightdragon88, keep it up!  But what happens if we run out of female champs to write about?  And will Shyvana ever be the blind date?  Who knows - if what we think is going to happen happens, it would make sense ... Anyway, thanks again for the stories!

noooooooooo....... ;w;
i guess no dragon babies DX
Humans? Certainly. Dragons? Who knows. While I strongly suspect you are correct, it doesn't mean we cannot enjoy the entertainment value of such of prospect; suspension of disbelief and all that!

little {{champion:102}} And {{champion:59}} Babys!!!!
OMG cant wait till the next one!
Awesome Job love your stories!
Well you are going to have to wait I am afraid.
fun I hope {{champion:89}} +{{champion:131}}  gets explored.
where is the first one?

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/fancreations/zLAEmrBJ-jarvan-iv-blind-date-stories

All archived here.

Awesome job as always!

{{champion:85}} Nurse, our patient will need some time to take in the results, would you get her anything she needs while I attend to other patients?
{{champion:84}} On it.
{{champion:102}} You again?
{{champion:84}} I work here! When I'm not busy being a ninja, I enjoy helping others. Believe it or not, I just seem to have this uncanny knack for running into both you and Jarvan... constantly. Are you guys stalking me?
{{champion:102}} *Glares angrily.*
{{champion:84}} It was a joke. Sorry.
{{champion:102}} It's alright, I'm a little edgy given the results. *Holds our X-Ray for Nurse Akali to inspect.*
{{champion:84}} I see. Well I'm sure Doctor Kennen will be return soon to discuss this in greater detail. In the meantime, I'll be just outside if you need me.
{{champion:102}} Thank you.
DEMACIBABIES!
I never really care about the sales, but I was bored and read the comments... THERE IS A STORY WITH SHYVANA! *goes back and reads all of them!*
Was it a good read?
What are you gonna do when you run out of female champions to put in? Btw nice story i like thetwist.{{champion:59}} +{{champion:102}} = ?
{{champion:59}} +{{champion:102}} ={{summoner:31}}
.{{champion:59}} {{item:3113}} {{champion:102}} O_o
Now now...that would be spoiling the ending.
Your stories seem to have quite the following. And, after having read them all, I will admit they are quite amusing. Have you ever received any recognition by Riot?

First thought that popped into my mind when reading the end: {{champion:102}} + {{champion:50}}  = {{champion:3}}ish hybrid bird/dragon things. 
BTW lightdragoon88 - Love your stories! Please keep up the good work!
PINK TARIC BEST TARIC
Fabulous!
OUTRAGEOUS
Is it... Truly...?
*enter awesome joke about zed being on sale here*
*starts heated thread about how balanced Zed is and how I mained him for 14 years and how if he is nerrfed he will fall into oblivion and how everyone is a douchebag for wanting Zed nerfed*
*starts heated counterargument about how OP Zed is and how he needs to be nerfed and anyone who mains him is an idiot because he sucks anyways*
*Doesn't really care, but argues vehemently against Zed because I didn't get enough attention as a child*
P.S: I was joking, don't worry I want him gone too.
He is gone, that's just his shadow you see.
WAIT yorik on sale? dadada {{champion:83}}

Yorick and his skins have been on sale many times before.

It the free week rotation that he never in.
I wonder why that is... I really want to try him.
He's considered to be too toxic.
Funny, I thought that'd be {{champion:27}}

{{champion:268}} I will forever be alone without my wife and child (Sobs)
[Halfway Across the world]
{{champion:32}} I wish I knew my real identity, (sobs)
Still waiting for Pentakill Karthus to be on sale
pk karthus wont go on sale till about june at the earliest.
Finally, {{champion:44}}'s best skin gets some love!
I still have not had this explained to me, WHAT IS A YORICK?  (P.S. This is a joke I would like to main him if he was meta)
Meta Shmeta, Go play him.
